00014     const int EcalDigiProducer::NUM_ECAL_LAYERS = 33;
00015     const int EcalDigiProducer::BACK_ECAL_STARTING_LAYER = 20;
00016     const int EcalDigiProducer::NUM_LAYERS_FOR_MED_CAL = 10;

00020     EcalDigiProducer::EcalDigiProducer(const std::string& name, Process& process) :
00021             Producer(name, process) {
00022     }
00023 
00024     void EcalDigiProducer::configure(const ParameterSet& ps) {
00025 
00026         hexReadout_ = new EcalHexReadout();
00027         noiseInjector_ = new TRandom2(ps.getInteger("randomSeed", 0));
00028         meanNoise_ = ps.getDouble("meanNoise");
00029         readoutThreshold_ = ps.getDouble("readoutThreshold");
00030 
00031         ecalDigis_ = new TClonesArray(EventConstants::ECAL_HIT.c_str(), 10000);
00032     }
00033 
00034     void EcalDigiProducer::produce(Event& event) {
00035 
00036         TClonesArray* ecalSimHits = (TClonesArray*) event.getCollection(EventConstants::ECAL_SIM_HITS);
00037         int numEcalSimHits = ecalSimHits->GetEntries();
00038 
00039         std::cout << "[ EcalDigiProducer ] : Got " << numEcalSimHits << " ECal hits in event " << event.getEventHeader()->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00040 
00041         //First we simulate noise injection into each hit and store layer-wise max cell ids
00042         int iHitOut = 0;
00043         for (int iHit = 0; iHit < numEcalSimHits; iHit++) {
00044             SimCalorimeterHit* simHit = (SimCalorimeterHit*) ecalSimHits->At(iHit);
00045 
00046             double hitNoise = noiseInjector_->Gaus(0, meanNoise_);
00047             layer_cell_pair hit_pair = hitToPair(simHit);
00048 
00049             EcalHit* digiHit = (EcalHit*) (ecalDigis_->ConstructedAt(iHit));
00050 
00051             //  hit->setLayer(hit_pair.first);
00052             digiHit->setID(simHit->getID());
00053             digiHit->setAmplitude(simHit->getEdep());
00054             double energy = simHit->getEdep() + hitNoise;
00055             if (energy > readoutThreshold_) {
00056                 digiHit->setEnergy(energy);
00057                 digiHit->setTime(simHit->getTime());
00058             } else {
00059                 digiHit->setEnergy(0);
00060                 digiHit->setTime(-1000);
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         event.add("ecalDigis", ecalDigis_);
00065     }
00066 
00067 }
